data.text: Guye loo ɠundiɠii nɔnɔi ʋe. Kolé mavofodaiti ta-ɠidafaawui.
Ee, GALA, gi mɛnini ga gi-woiyeɠeiti,
È-yeei ɠa è zii ɠiligiti kpɛɛni la, è gi-mɛmɛwolani seizu ve,
Mazɔlɔɔ ta-woɠa zɔkpɔi laade, ti ʋa zooi zɔlɔɔ da ga tɔnɔ.
Ee, GALA, ɗa ɠa è ga nà-masagi,
Gá ɠɛna è ʋolu, gá gi zili nuiti toka,
Mazɔlɔɔ gè la ɠalivaani nà-mɛɛin ma,
Kɛlɛ ɗa ɠa è gi ɠizosu gi zili nuiti ma,
Gá-ƓALAGI, gá è maamusɛzu folo-o-folo,
Anɛɛ naa ʋe, è gi ʋiliga ya, è unfegi yei ga giye,
Ɗa vaazu bu gi zili nuiti ti gi ɓɛ,
È gi lɔɔni ti yeezu eɠɛ baalagiti ti liizu ti ʋaazu,
È ɗa-nuɓusɛiti pɔdini ga daanɛai,
È gi ɠɛɛni ga zɔngɔzɛlɛ ba anii, gi-zeiɲɔɠɔiti zea,
È gi ɠɛa ga ɲɛɛɠulasu anii zii ɠiligiti zea,
Nà-ɓaaɠulamai ɠa tùɠɔ yeenɔpɛ,
siɛgi zu gè zɔngɔzɛlɛ ba nui wooi mɛnisu da,
Naa kpein ka zeelizu gi ma,
Gi la ʋoluaveni ɗa gi-yiimaʋɛ,
anɛɛ naa ʋe, è gi wolowoloni koʋeiti pɛɛzuʋɛ,
Ni gi yeemani gá-ƓALAGI laaseigi ma,
GALA ge la ɓena naa ʋoluɠula ɓaa,
Kɛlɛ è maaʋele ɠa é kɛɛzu, ti gi lɔɔzu la saai zu folo-o-folo,
Wuzeɠe! Leeni vaa zu è ɲiizu, Màliɠii?
Leeni vaa zu è ɠaazuʋɛ lɔɔɠuzu?
Mazɔlɔɔ gá laani fufiligi zu, ziiɓɔlɔi zu,
Wuzeɠe! È ɓɔ gi ʋa!
